definitions.definition: A monk 's hood that can be pulled forward to cover the face; a robe with such a hood attached to it.
A mask that covers the majority of the head.
A thin protective covering over all or part of an engine; also cowling .
A usually hood -shaped covering used to increase the draft of a chimney and prevent backflow .
( nautical ) A ship's ventilator with a bell-shaped top which can be swivelled to catch the wind and force it below.
( nautical ) A vertical projection of a ship's funnel that directs the smoke away from the bridge .

main_definition: A monk 's hood that can be pulled forward to cover the face; a robe with such a hood attached to it.
secondary_definitions: A mask that covers the majority of the head.
A thin protective covering over all or part of an engine; also cowling .
A usually hood -shaped covering used to increase the draft of a chimney and prevent backflow .
( nautical ) A ship's ventilator with a bell-shaped top which can be swivelled to catch the wind and force it below.
( nautical ) A vertical projection of a ship's funnel that directs the smoke away from the bridge .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete , British ) A vessel carried on a pole, a soe .

main_definition: ( obsolete , British ) A vessel carried on a pole, a soe .

definitions.definition: A caul ( the amnion which encloses the foetus before birth, especially that part of it which sometimes shrouds a baby’s head at birth ) .

main_definition: A caul ( the amnion which encloses the foetus before birth, especially that part of it which sometimes shrouds a baby’s head at birth ) .
